name: PR_EST_EXTERNAL_CXT
description: This table contains external context related information for estimates.

columns.name: ESTIMATE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the patient estimate record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: POS_ID_LOC_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue location.
